snippet.title: STORYTELLER | Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Storyteller is coming soon to Nintendo Switch and Steam. Add it to your wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1624540?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=072921&utm_medium=directreach

Storyteller is a unique and creative spin on the puzzle genre.  You’re given a variety of iconic characters, settings, and emotions to build tales of love, betrayal, and revenge.  You’ll create everything from supernatural fantasies and Shakespearean tragedies to myths of creation and much more! 

Developed by DANIEL BENMERGUI. Published by Annapurna Interactive. 

© Annapurna Interactive, 2021
